description: For some x, x!+a(n) or x!-a(n) are the upper and lower primes closest to x!.
comments: These d differences are the smallest ones of their actual property.
example: For n=10 n!=3628800, d=11 and the closest primes to 10! are q=10!-11=3628789 p=10!+11=3628811 The d differences are listed here.
author: _Labos Elemer_, Feb 10 2000
